msContents.summary: This text is written by Rāmakṛṣṇasūro. The poem is aobut Śaṃkarācārya. It seems to be a rare text.

msItem.title: Śivakeśādipādāntavarṇana
msItem.author: Rāmakṛṣṇasūri

filiation.p: New Catalogus Catalogorum vol 34 pp: 71 VOHD II,6:p: 729, entry. 2079

msItem.rubric: 1v 1 śrīgaṇādhīpataye namaḥ . śrīsarasvatyai namaḥ . śrīgurucaraṇāravindānyāṃ namaḥ . śūbhamastu .. ..
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 oṃ śrīrāmaṃ sarvalokeśaṃ 1v 2 bhaktasusvātamandiraṃ . bhāvayāmi paraṃbhrahmasarvadā siddhaye avalaṃbevilālaṃba laṃbodaravadañca yaṃ yadā laṃbyā 1v3 vilaṃbena labhate laṃbhudhaḥ śriyaḥ .. vāṇīkalyāṇī kalyāṇaśreṇīti śreṇīsaṃstave madīyyarasanā vedyāṃ vihare
msItem.explicit: 28v 8 ākhaṇḍavāṇiya vāṇyaḥ khaṇḍībhūtārimaṇḍaḥ kalayatu bhavatāṃśar mmaśaṃbhuḥ pracaṇḍaḥ ityā[huḥ]?
msItem.finalRubric: 29r 1 iti śrīmatparamahamsaparivrājakācāryasya śrīmacśaṃkarabhagavatpujyapādakṛteḥ śīvakeśadipādaparaṃgāntastu 29r 2 ter bhāradvājena rāmakṛṣṇasuriṇā kṛtā vyākhyā saṃpūrṇā .. .. … (design of a flower) …śrī sadāśivārppa 29r 3 ṇamastu . …. … (design of a flower) …. … …. … yādṛśaṃ pustakaṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśaṃ likhitaṃ mayā yadi śuddhā aśu 29r4 ddhā vā mama doṣo na vidyate .. .. śrīgurucaraṇāravindārpaṇamastu .. … ..

support.p: Only front guard folio. Thin palm leaf is used as guard.
